context: Dell Technologies Inc. is a technology infrastructure company focused on PCs, servers, storage, and IT infrastructure solutions. AI infrastructure leader. PowerEdge AI servers and storage growth.

competitors.name: Hewlett-Packard (HP)
competitors.notes: Leading competitor in PCs, laptops, printers, and enterprise solutions with decades-long market presence

competitors.name: Lenovo
competitors.notes: Major competitor with strong innovation focus; diverse product portfolio including laptops, desktops, tablets, smartphones

competitors.name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE)
competitors.notes: Key enterprise competitor providing intelligent edge-to-cloud solutions, servers, storage, and infrastructure

competitors.name: Apple
competitors.notes: Premium technology competitor in PCs and consumer electronics

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Enterprise technology, infrastructure, and services competitor

competitors.name: NetApp
competitors.notes: Major enterprise data storage and infrastructure competitor

competitors.name: Pure Storage
competitors.notes: Enterprise storage and infrastructure solutions competitor

competitors.name: Samsung
competitors.notes: Consumer electronics, PC, and technology solutions competitor
